column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies and providing a clear explanation of why it would be beneficial. Keep up the good work!
8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. Your response has some good points, but it lacks specific details on how scrum/sprint could operate for the chosen function.

7/10 - Your explanation of why kanban is not the best fit for the production function is mostly clear, but there is some vagueness in your discussion. Keep up the good work and try to be more specific in your explanations.

8 pts - You identified distribution as a business function that could benefit from kanban, but it would be more convincing with a clearer explanation of how kanban could be implemented in this function.
